member.summary: Gets an array of tasks that the user can perform whilst trading with a foreign leader.
member.param: The DiplomaticTie that exists between the two countries.
member.returns: An array of DiplomaticTask enums representing tasks that can be performed by the user during the trade negotiations.
member.remarks: These tasks will be different than those returned from GetDiplomacyTasks(). These tasks will be specific to the actual process of trading items with the foreign country, while the GetDiplomacyTasks() covered other tasks such as declaring war, offering peace treaties, etc...
